description: "The southern coast of Borneo is labelled ‘Cote des Mahometans [Coast of the Muslims]’. A note next to the Philippines states that they were discovered by Ferdinand Magellan in 1520 and are comprised of about 11,000 islands."
title: "L'Asie divisée en ses principales parties oú les empires, roïaumes etats et peuples sont distingues les uns des autres"
